CatDescriptText: Other sign on wall inscribed "Hey Kids!  Join the Center Now!!  Enroll with these groups:- Children's Theatre, Art Class, Cartooning, Plastic Jewelry, Chorus, NAACP"
TitMainTitle: Girl standing on chair and looking at large sign inscribed "Re-elect Congress...And Negroes Are Daily Forging Ahead in the Sciences and the Arts. Recognition upon Ability, Rather than Race. Therein Lies the Only True Hope For Democracy"
